Text:
Thanks BobnJeff!

One question: is this file CINAVIA protected? (I stream to a PS3 using ps media server; cinavia files      won't play properly...)

Everyone else, please consider including a "Cinavia protected: Y/N" line in the .nfo files for your releases! Thanks!

I haven't heard anything from you regarding to the request I have

Problems - the file showed up as "corrupt" at 99 percent downloaded. When I completed the download, it wouldn't play past the MGM Lion. It could be my computer. VLC, I've noticed, HATES mkv files past a certain size range. So, I tried it with Quicktime and it plays a little into the MGM Lion but glitches out and the file just stops entirely. Good try, man, but I'll get the movie from elsewhere. :( May work for some people but doesn't work for me.
